contents: Article 6 (Accounting Unit) ① The accounting unit of the Corporation is determined by the Enforcement Rules (hereinafter referred to as *Rules). Revised 2016. 11. 14., ② The accounting of each accounting unit is overseen by the headquarters accounting unit. ③ The headquarters accounting unit is the department in charge of accounting and settlement work according to the division of duties in accordance with the 「Organization Regulations」, and is deemed necessary for business. In this case, subsidiary accounting may be established.
